name: Auto-Layout Social Cards
description:
Fully Editable Social/Ad cards for Facebook, Linkedin & Twitter

--

How to use:
1. Drag your logo + artwork to the placeholder boxes (Make sure your artwork is set to scale in constraints.)
2. Edit any of the text, including ui elements

Why:
When mocking up social ads, it's always helpful for clients to see the post and description copy in a realistic environment with the ad/artwork. Figma's auto-layout functionalty finally makes this process painless.
